interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which produces 20% of the world's oxygen.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
Germany is home to over 1,500 different types of sausages.
Egypt has the only remaining ancient wonder of the world: the Great Pyramid of Giza.
India is the largest democracy in the world.
France is the most visited country in the world.
South Africa has three capitals: Pretoria, Bloemfontein, and Cape Town.
Mexico introduced chocolate, chilies, and corn to the world.
